summary: Small cottage located east of Marcath with working alchemy and kitchen, as well as some crafting equipment outside.
descriptionHtml:
[Game]
Skyrim
[Mod Name]
Penrose Cottage
[Author(s)]
132885
[Contact Info]
Aquariumreef@yahoo.com
[Version]
1.0

[Description]
This mod adds a quaint cottage located east of Markath. 
It features:
 Stunning views of the river and waterfall.
Access only by water.
All safe storage.
Navmesh for everyone!
A fully working kitchen.
An alchemy area with storage for all your ingredients.
Relaxing built-up pool with fountain.
Small crafting stations outside on deck.
Various clutter for a \'lived-in\' feeling while still allowing additional clutter to be added.
[Change Log]
V1.0 Initial release.
[Required Files]
Skyrim.esp
[Installation]
Extract files into safe place,  place the .esp in the DATA folder, and the meshes and textures in the mesh and texture folders, respectively.
[Uninstallation]
Remove all files and delete .esp.
[Known Issues]

[Incompatibilities]
No known incompatibilities. Contact me if you fine any.
[Tools Used]
Skyrim Creation Kit
Nifscope
Skyrim Readme Generator 
[Permissions]
You must ask permission before repackaging anything from this mod. That means YOU.
